project.name: C-C089B-WIRE-06-ST03-DT03-DF16-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C089B-WIRE-06-ST03-DT03-DF16-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Good inputs: 1) name of country for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:1) SQL argument injection 2) SQL command injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="USA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C089B-WIRE-06-ST03-DT03-DF16-CF19-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Good inputs: 1) name of country for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:1) SQL argument injection 2) SQL command injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="x' or 'x'='x" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_u6IB2aNQ5XHExyge3HZA AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_NUuXN4NLA5 OR db_sql_output_P8O6PYFHHX) AND NOT timeout_bHGmf9gKv3) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_NUuXN4NLA5 OR db_sql_output_P8O6PYFHHX) OR timeout_bHGmf9gKv3 OR controlled_exit_wCEZrfZuBl)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_NUuXN4NLA5 OR db_sql_output_P8O6PYFHHX) AND NOT timeout_bHGmf9gKv3) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_NUuXN4NLA5 OR db_sql_output_P8O6PYFHHX) OR timeout_bHGmf9gKv3 OR controlled_exit_wCEZrfZuBl))

compare_check.name: db_sql_output_NUuXN4NLA5
compare_check.expected: THEBI The Big Cheese Liz Nixon Marketing Manager89 Jefferson Way Suite 2Portland OR 97201 USA (503) 555-3612

compare_check.name: db_sql_output_P8O6PYFHHX
compare_check.expected: WHITC 7 1998-05-01 1998-05-29 1998-05-04 2 44.72 White Clover Markets1029 - 12th Ave. S.Seattle WA 98124 USA
